author: Andrew Ackerman, Ben Eisen
title: Fed 'Temporarily' Eases Capital Requirements for Big Banks...
description: Fed 'Temporarily' Eases Capital Requirements for Big Banks... (Top headline, 1st story, link ) Related stories: Virus hot spots clamor for quick tests... More evidence indicates healthy people can spread... Bluetooth-enabled armbands to trace infected? MAG: M…
content:
The Federal Reserve on Wednesday eased rules around how banks account for their supersafe assets, a move meant to boost the flow of credit to cash-strapped consumers and businesses during the coronavirus slowdown.
